descript.abstract: The Index Detail Static Metadata table records what columns of a table make up a particular index. Each record in this table represents one column of a particular index.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: The name that is used to physically implement a table column in a database management system. In a database table, each column's physical name must be unique.
The name that is used to physically implement an index in a database management system.
Specifies the sequence of a column in a database table index.
The name that is used to physically implement a table in a database management system. In a database, each table's physical name must be unique.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
